name: Ghoking Scepter
imagePrompt: A regal, glowing digital scepter with a small, stylized crown at its tip, surrounded by faint code lines and a 'GHO' symbol, looking powerful and slightly mischievous.
abilityText: After your hero attacks, draw a card. 'Ghoking!'
flavorText: Wielded by the true king, it fixes problems, claims thrones, and ensures 'we need better daos <3'.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, draw a card.
